item.title: By: Joseph Scott

@Lloyd Budd -
It was just something that I cobbled together. I've still got the code that I can send your way.
item.content:encoded:

It was just something that I cobbled together. I’ve still got the code that I can send your way.

item.title: By: Lloyd Budd

item.title: By: Beth

item.description: Rome, IN the coliseum. Well done.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott

item.description: I'm going to go with Rome, in front of the coliseum.
item.content:encoded: I’m going to go with Rome, in front of the coliseum.

item.title: By: Beth
item.dc:creator: Beth
item.description: Ha ha. The real trick is, now that you've bumped up the image size, can you tell where this picture was taken?
item.content:encoded: Ha ha. The real trick is, now that you’ve bumped up the image size, can you tell where this picture was taken?

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description: I've bumped the size of the gravatar image that I use up. Mostly so that I can see how big Beth's glasses really are :-)
item.content:encoded: I’ve bumped the size of the gravatar image that I use up. Mostly so that I can see how big Beth’s glasses really are ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
@Laura -
Yep, and all of your other other comments on this blog will now have your photo as well.
item.content:encoded:
@Laura –

Yep, and all of your other other comments on this blog will now have your photo as well.

item.title: By: Laura Moncur
item.dc:creator: Laura Moncur
item.description: Okay, I signed up for Gravatar. Will it just automatically put my photo here? Let's see...
item.content:encoded: Okay, I signed up for Gravatar. Will it just automatically put my photo here? Let’s see…
